data.title: Alt Nation: Listen to New Alternative Music
data.meta_description: Rock out to the latest alternative music. Hear The Black Keys, Twenty One Pilots, Bastille, Muse & all your favorite alt rock bands 24/7. Listen now on SiriusXM.
data.text:
Madison regrets to admit her first concert was Julian Lennon. As to being a DJ she says, "I was too ugly to be in the movies …

Madison regrets to admit her first concert was Julian Lennon. As to being a DJ she says, "I was too ugly to be in the movies," however Howard Stern himself has told her she's cute. If she weren't a DJ, she'd be a babysitter... or a hooker. Her worst job? "I was a chimney sweep. God, that sucked."

Alt Nation's weekly new music show! Discover the newest of new alternative rock, brand new bands and new music from the bigg …

Alt Nation's weekly new music show! Discover the newest of new alternative rock, brand new bands and new music from the biggest names in alt-rock!

We need your help in selecting the week’s 18 most-requested new alternative rock songs. Request your favorite song at <a hre …

We need your help in selecting the week’s 18 most-requested new alternative rock songs. Request your favorite song at AltNation@siriusxm.com and listen as we count down the best new alternative as selected by you.

Hear the latest alternative rock from bands like Muse, The Black Keys, Silversun Pickups and the next big thing before it be …

Hear the latest alternative rock from bands like Muse, The Black Keys, Silversun Pickups and the next big thing before it becomes so big you can't stand it anymore.

An emo kid on the inside, cat mom on the oustide - Tatiana can usually be found looking for the next concert to go to or pla …

An emo kid on the inside, cat mom on the oustide - Tatiana can usually be found looking for the next concert to go to or planning her next big trip. Based out of Los Angeles, she loves discovering new music she can obsess over and will take any opportunity to talk all things animals or aliens. Alt and pop punk are the soundtrack to her daily life so don' try talking to her when she has headphones on.

DJing is a lot better than Jeff Regan’s former job as a hole watcher. “No joke!” he says. “I had to stand outside an empty oil tank all day and write down who walked in and out of the hole.” At Alt Nation, he’s occasionally called upon when there’s a need for someone to watch the paint dry, but mostly it’s his skills on the mic that are taken advantage of.

Madison regrets to admit her first concert was Julian Lennon. As to being a DJ, she says, “I was too ugly to be in the movies,” however, Howard Stern himself has told her she’s cute. If she weren’t a DJ, she’d be a babysitter...or a hooker. Her worst job? “I was a chimney sweep. God, that sucked.”

Also appears on Lithium

After a knee injury brought JaRon's competitive ballroom dancing career to an end, he found work as a door-to-door vacuum salesman. Upon being fired from that he made his way back to Los Angeles where he found work in radio.

Also appears on SiriusXMU
